title: Efficient Processing of Deep Neural Networks: A Tutorial and Survey
author: Vivienne Sze
Yu-hsin Chen
Josiah Emer
description: This book provides a structured treatment of the key principles and techniques for enabling efficient processing of deep neural networks (DNNs). It covers various aspects of DNN efficiency, including model compression, hardware acceleration, and software optimization. The book also discusses the trade-offs between accuracy, power consumption, and latency.

title: Low Power Design Essentials
author: Jan M. Rabaey
description: This book provides a comprehensive overview of low-power design techniques for digital systems. It covers a wide range of topics, including power estimation, low-power circuit design, and architectural techniques for power reduction.

title: Computer Architecture: A Quantitative Approach
author: John L. Hennessy
David A. Patterson
description: This book provides a comprehensive introduction to computer architecture and design. It covers the fundamental principles of computer organization and design, including instruction set architecture, pipelining, memory hierarchy, and parallelism.

title: Joel on Software
author: Joel Spolsky
description: A popular blog about software development, management, and the business of technology. It covers a wide range of topics, from technical advice to management tips.

title: Digital Integrated Circuits: A Design Perspective
author: Jan M. Rabaey, Anantha Chandrakasan, Borivoje Nikolic
description: This book provides a comprehensive introduction to the design of digital integrated circuits. It covers a wide range of topics, including digital design fundamentals, CMOS technology, circuit design, and system-level design.

title: Inverse Heat Conduction: Ill-Posed Problems
author: Keith A. Woodbury
Hamidreza Najafi
Filippo de Monte
James V. Beck
description: This book explores the challenges and techniques for solving inverse heat conduction problems, which are often ill-posed due to their sensitivity to measurement noise and uncertainties.
